Package de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.plugin.algo.suffixtrees

Class Summary
SimpleNode Node Class for the suffix tree, implementing an Interface for LCA-queries
SuffixNode Abstract superclass for tree nodes
UkkonenSuffixTree A suffix tree is an efficient method for encoding the frequencies of motifs in a sequence.
WordSuffixTree Implementation based on the linear-time algorithm for constructing word-based suffix trees as described by Andersson, Larsson & Swansson in Algorithmica 23, 1999

Subclasses a modified UkkonenSuffixTree class from BioJava API, builds a word based tree with symbols representing the words which are stored separately in a map

TODO implement LCE over LCA (then kmismatch an wildcards are running in linear time), see LCE

TODO implement adding of texts atfer instantiation for more flexibility
